title: liquidated the victim funds
extract: Liquidation involves the sale of all of a fund's assets and the distribution of the proceeds to the fund shareholders. At best, it means shareholders are forced to sell at a time not of their choosing. ... Most dead funds are merged into another in the fund family.Feb 7, 2018
extract_html: Liquidation involves the sale of all of a fund's assets and the distribution of the proceeds to the fund shareholders. At best, it means shareholders are forced to sell at a time not of their choosing. ... Most dead funds are merged into another in the fund family.Feb 7, 2018
